description: I'm a frontend developer skilled in building responsive, high-performance web apps using React and Next.js. I began in QA and am now exploring backend and cloud to grow as a full-stack developer.

timeline.text: Completed Computer Science engineering with 9.32 CGPA, gaining a strong base in programming and web development.
Worked as a full-stack developer to build and deploy a complete website. Gained hands-on experience with React and Node.js.
Maintained the user-facing website and executed 100+ automated test cases using Java and Selenium, improving defect detection rate by 40%.

Building performance-optimized, SEO-friendly web applications using React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Headless CMS platforms like Contentful and Contentstack. Collaborating with UI/UX teams and backend developers to deliver scalable, accessible, and responsive digital experiences.
